description: Creates a role assignment by ID.

role_assignment_id.description: The fully qualified ID of the role assignment, including the scope, resource name and resource type. Use the format, /{scope}/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleAssignments/{roleAssignmentName}. Example: /subscriptions/{subId}/resourcegroups/{rgname}//providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleAssignments/{roleAssignmentName}.

api_version.description: The API version to use for this operation.
